New Records: Luka Modric became the European Championship’s oldest goalscorer.
Key Match Events: Mattia Zaccagni scored Italy’s equaliser in the last minute of added time.
Luka Modric missed a penalty but scored moments later.
Gianluigi Donnarumma saved a penalty from Luka Modric.
Riccardo Calafiori made a crucial run and assist for Italy's equaliser.
Josko Gvardiol earned acclaim for his defensive play.
Pre-Game Insights: Luciano Spalletti admitted before the game that Croatia was technically superior.
Post-Match Reflections: Luciano Spalletti had little time for expressions of negativity in the post-match press conference.
Luka Modric looked desolate upon collecting the man of the match award.
Modric did not commit to a future in Croatia’s shirt after the match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Smoke from fireworks drifted through the air during the match.
The atmosphere was described as pregnant with the kind of twist that would unleash chaos.
